```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(boot)
library(gt)
library(patchwork)
library(broom)
library(nlstools)
library(readxl)

ucsb_survey <- read_xlsx(here("data", "ucsb_survey.xlsx")) 


```

```{r}
proportion_fun <- function (x,i) {proportions(x[i])}

#get vector of column
survey_nc <- ucsb_survey$exp_cond

boot_100 <- boot(survey_nc,
                 statistic = proportion_fun,
                 R = 100)
```
